abstract: Elizabeth Warren, the head of the new Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, has already met with top bankers including Jamie Dimon of JPMorgan Chase and Vikram S. Pandit of Citigroup.
snippet: Elizabeth Warren, the head of the new Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, has already met with top bankers including Jamie Dimon of JPMorgan Chase and Vikram S. Pandit of Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is finally at home in the nation’s capital.

headline.main: New Consumer Bureau Reaches Out to Wall Street
